Text: VIDEO: US President Donald Trump spurred fresh outrage Monday after police used tear gas to clear protesters from outside the White House so he could pose for photographs at a nearby church damaged during civil unrest https://t.co/8XPv0YgVHJ
Biden on Trump: "His Narcissism has become more important than the nation that he leads.""Think of where we are now ... is this who are? Is this where we want to be?"

Tucker Carlson: "These riots effectively are the largest Joe Biden for president rally on record. In gratitude for that, more than a dozen Joe Biden for president campaign staffers donated money to the rioters in Minneapolis and then they bragged about it" https://t.co/x1NyKnOUjC

Biden calls on Congress to pass police reforms:- outlaw chokeholds- stop transferring weapons of war to police- better oversight ; accountabilityCommits to creating national police oversight commission in the first 100 days of presidency.
Biden is talking about loss, suffering and death in this pandemic, something Trump has been unable to do even once as 107,000 have died in 3 months.
